Package Controllers

Class AppointmentScreen

java.lang.Object
Controllers.AppointmentScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentScreen extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the AppointmentScreen class which is a controller and implements an Initializable method. This class handles all functionality for the appointment screen of the application.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize (URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This is the override initialize method for the AppointmentScreen class and is processed as soon as this screen is opened. This method initializes the appointmentsTableview and populates the combo boxes with data.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The uniform Resource Locator that is a pointer to a location.
      resourceBundle - Contains locale specific objects for the class.

    • filterAppointments

      public void filterAppointments (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the action event to filter all appointments by all,month, and current week.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the radio buttons are selected.

    • modifyAppointment

      public void modifyAppointment (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method gets the selected appointments data to be modified/updated and populates the text field,combo boxes, and date picker with the correct saved data.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the modifyAptBtn is selected.

    • deleteAppointment

      public void deleteAppointment (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method will check for a selected appointment and if one is selected it will delete the appointment from the appointments table.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the deleteAptBtn is clicked.

    • addAppointment

      public void addAppointment (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles adding a new appointment to the appointments table in the data base. It also handles input validation for blank fields, appointment time overlaps, and wrong time slots.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the addAppointBtn is pressed.

    • updateAppointment

      public void updateAppointment (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method retrieves all the input from the text fields, date picker, and combo boxes and updates that appointment object in the database with the new data. It also has input validation for blank fields, time overlaps, time errors, and no change warnings.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the updateAppointBtn is pressed.

    • timeOverlapCheck

      public boolean timeOverlapCheck (LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerId, int appointmentId)
      This method uses allAppts observable list to check for any appointment time overlaps for all customers and returns the boolean result.
      Parameters:
      start - LocalDateTime value for appointment start time.
      end - LocalDateTime value for appointment end time.
      customerId - integer value for customerId.
      appointmentId - integer value for appointmentId.
      Returns:
      boolean value for result

    • checkForUpcomingAppointments

      public static void checkForUpcomingAppointments()
      This method checks the database for any appointments starting in the next 15 minutes for the current day and alerts the user if there is one or not.

    • startTimeSelectionMade

      public void startTimeSelectionMade (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Enables the appointment end time combo box once a starting time is selected in the startTimeCombo combo box.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the user selects an item in the startTimeCombo combo box

    • clearAllFields

      public void clearAllFields (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Clears all text fields and combo boxes by reloading the page.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the clearBtn is pressed.

    • checkInput

      public boolean checkInput()
      Checks that there are no empty text fields or null combo boxes or date picker.
      Returns:
      Boolean result-true or false

    • backToCustomers

      public void backToCustomers (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method will navigate the user to the customers screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the customersNavBtn is pressed.

    • toReports

      public void toReports (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method will navigate the user to the ReportScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the toReports button is pressed.
